description:
With The Sledgehammer set to strike, Yuya uses Pendulum power to swing the duel his way!  Can this phenomenal new summoning method help Yuya hammer the Hammer?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel Saikyou Shinkakei!! Sono Na wa Action Duel
The Strongest Evolution of Dueling!! Its Name Is Action Duel
決闘[デュエル]最強進化系!! その名はアクションデュエル
